description: This file contains CSS styles for theme management in a React application, defining variables for light and dark themes, as well as styles for the main application and specific elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application that centers content and applies theme colors.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component that provides layout and styling for the application header.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animations.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the button that toggles between light and dark themes.
